summary: This document is a summary of account activity for the Butterfly Trust at Deutsche Bank for January 2015. It details account balances, transactions including outgoing money transfers, and interest payments. The document highlights significant financial movements and account management practices.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfers
events.description: Two outgoing money transfers were made to JP Morgan Chase totaling $75,000.

events.title: Interest Payment
events.description: An interest payment of $81.70 was credited to the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands 00802
keyFacts: The account balance as of January 31, 2015, was $415,764.64.
A total of $75,000 was transferred out of the account to JP Morgan Chase on January 28, 2015.
An interest payment of $81.70 was credited to the account on January 31, 2015.
The document includes contact information for inquiries regarding the account.
There were no overdraft fees charged during this statement period.
